nodes.text: The Imberlin system was located in the Imberlin sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. At some point by 2 ABY, an independent trader ran afoul of Imperial authorities in the system. The Gand findsman Lu'daal-ud subsequently captured the trader, in the process acquiring the merchant's shuttle, the Mist Laden.

The Imberlin system was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square P-14.
